name: Comet
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A 30 foot radius area centered on a point you can see is faintly marked with light. At the start of your next turn, a comet streaks down from the sky and impacts the target area. Anything in the center 5 feet takes 8d10 bludgeoning, 4d10 cold, and 4d10 radiant damage and becomes restrained by the comet. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 6d10 bludgeoning damage, 3d10 cold damage, and 3d10 radiant damage.

The comet remains in the location as a large object occupying a 10 foot radius.

The spell fails if the sky is not visible when you cast the spell, such as when you are indoors or underground.
